title: Leadership Practical Skills Enhancement: Nature-Friendly Talent Development for Gifted Students via VR-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain 3+ impacts of ocean acidification on ecosystems through VR simulation.
Learners show a 15%+ score improvement in the NR scale survey after IVR experiences.
Learners solve over 80% of SDGs-related problems in an escape-room-style formative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
